DOC.brief_summary: The investigators want to know whether the intravenous ascorbic acid would reduce the blood loss during laparoscopic myoma surgery. The investigators randomized patients into intravenous ascorbic acid group and placebo group and examined the blood loss in both groups.
DOC.brief_title: Study on the Effect of Intravenous Ascorbic Acid on Intraoperative Blood Loss in Women With Uterine Myoma
DOC.criteria: uterine myoma be planning to laparoscopic myomectomy images ; the number of myoma <4 images ; the diameter of the largest myoma <9cm be planning other surgery in addition to laparoscopy clinically significant coagulation abnormality
